author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Whatever happened to the animatronic shark--aka Bruce--from Steven Spielberg's Jaws? Adam visits Propstore where he encounters one of the rare surviving pieces from the iconic movie monster: its mechanical eyes! These were saved by the creature's effects artist creator Bob Mattey, who is seen holding this mechanism in a newspaper photo during the film's production!

Learn more about the upcoming Propstore EMLA: Los Angeles summer 2025 auction at https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/456

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: What Happened to the Mechanical Shark from Jaws?

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
A beloved ceramic vase. A crack … somewhere. A @fluke accounting imager and sound beacon. But will they help? Adam Savage uses his latest Fluke gear to answer some mysteries around his cave, starting with this one. 

Fluke ii915 Precision Acoustic Imager: https://bit.ly/44eUHVi
Fluke SB140 Sound Beacon: https://www.fluke.com/en-us/product/industrial-imaging/fluke-sb140

title: Can #AdamSavage Find a Crack Using SOUND? #science
